summary: When handyman Niller comes to install Sus' new kitchen one day, their immediate crush is a sweet escape from both of their problematic relationships.
cast: Sidse Babett Knudsen|Niels Olsen|Søs Egelind|Rafael Edholm|Paprika Steen|Sofie Gråbøl|Lars Kaalund|Vanessa Gouri|Hella Joof|Jannie Faurschou|Jacob Thuesen|Lars Kjeldgård|Berrit Kvorning|Liv Corfixen|Charlotte Munck|Arne Siemsen|Jan Hertz|Anders Hove|Lisbeth Gajhede|Charlotte Bøving|Klaus Bondam|Suzanne Darmer
title: Den eneste ene
